name: sambamba_coverage_uniformity_v1.0
title: Calculate the average uniformity for each region in a Panel for all provided samples
summary: For x samples this app uses the coverage bed files calculated by Sambamba to visualise the variability in coverage at each genomic region. It produces a separate rport for each panel Sambamba was run with.  Results are available as an interactive plot, simplified pdf plot, and csv table.

inputSpec.name: selected_project
inputSpec.label: Name of project holding Sambamba coverage bedfiles

outputSpec.name: verifybamid_out
outputSpec.label: verifyBamID output files
outputSpec.help: verifyBamID contamination statistics, read depth distribution and log file
